paragraphs: In Prague, from June 13 to September 30, the Landscape Festival 2024 will take place. Within its framework, residents will be able to view 32 installations by young artists, which will be installed in the districts of Zizkov and Malesice, as well as participate in various thematic lectures and other events.

"Our festival is a multidisciplinary platform that for over ten years has provided a space for discussions on the quality of the urban landscape in Czech, Moravian, and Silesian cities and villages. The main idea of the festival is to raise awareness about the scale, meaning, and significance of landscape architecture in relation to contemporary architecture, art, and public space."

"The festival aims to transform the urban landscape for the summer season and create a space for meetings of residents, politicians, professionals, and visitors through temporary architectural interventions, artistic installations, exhibitions, and happenings," as stated in the event description.
You can find a map with descriptions and locations of the participating sculptures, as well as a list of accompanying events here.
